settings.offer-text: Pay using Simpl and save up to ₹250*
settings.terms:
• Get 10% cashback up to ₹250 on your boAt transaction when paid using Simpl. 
  • Offer valid from 23rd August 2022 to 31st October 2022.
  • The offer is valid only once per user during the offer period.
  • No coupon code is required to avail the offer.
  • No minimum order value is required to be eligible for this offer.
  • You will be able to see the details of your eligible Cashback amount on the ‘Transactions’ section of the Simpl app
  • Details of eligible Cashback will additionally be communicated via email as well as SMS 
  • The eligible amount will be credited to a user’s Simpl account post settlement of the current dues.
  • Cashback will be canceled in case of full refunds or cancellation of orders.
  • Any customer availing the cashback shall be deemed to have accepted the terms and conditions.
  • Simpl reserves the right to disqualify the user from cashback eligibility if any fraudulent activity is identified.
  • To check your transaction history, cashback amount and bill repayment download the Simpl App available on Android & iOS.
  • Happy to assist you with further concerns. Please write to help@getsimpl.com. Or, Click here to chat with the Simpl Team.

settings.offer-text: Get Upto Rs 500 Cashback + Extra Savings with Rewards
settings.terms:
• No Minimum order value
  • Get Upto Rs 500 Cashback; Extra savings with Rewards is applicable on using Pay with Rewards on boAt.
  • No promo code required
  • Customers who are not enrolled on any of the associated loyalty programs on Pay with Rewards will not be eligible for the offer.
  • Offer is valid from 23rd May 2022 00:01 AM to 31st May 2022 11:59 PM
  • Cashback will be auto credited in Pay with Rewards within 24 hours of the transaction
  • Offer applicable only on orders through boAt App, Website & Msite.
  • Twid and boAt reserves the right to withdraw, modify or replace this offer with another offer at any time without prior notice and the same is at the sole discretion of the company.
  • This offer cannot be combined with any other payment offer.
  • This Offer is conducted by Twidpay.
  • By availing this offer, it is deemed that the customer has agreed to all the terms & conditions mentioned herein.

• Flat 500 INR cashback on cart value of 2999 INR & above.
  • The offer is valid only at the boAt website & on all products on boAt except when you use a Gift Card.
  • Offer valid once per user only on successful Bolt ZestMoney transactions.
  • No Coupon is required, pay through ZestMoney at the checkout and be eligible for the cashback.
  • The cashback offer is valid till 31st July'22.
  • The cashback will be processed within 3 months of campaign end date, subject to no overdue during this time

settings.offer-text: Get a cashback of 20% up to ₹500 with axio
settings.terms:
• Offer: Get a cashback of 20% up to ₹500 with axio pay later
  • How can the customer avail the cashback: The customer is eligible for/ can avail the cashback by choosing to pay with axio pay later at checkout
  • How does the offer work? Once a customer transacts via axio pay later, they will be eligible for cashback. Settlement of cashback will happen through a redemption link sent to the customer within 1-3 working days of the date of repayment of first EMI.
  • On which product(s) is the offer valid: Valid on all products on boAt above Rs. 1500 except Gift Card.
  • Offer validity: The offer is valid for transactions using axio pay later from 16 May 2022 12:00 am to 31 Oct 2022, 11:59 pm.
  • Platforms valid on: Offer is valid on all transactions using axio pay later on website, iOS & Android app.
  • Usage of the offer more than once: This offer is valid for only first time axio pay later transactions.
  • Canceled/ refunded transactions: The offer would not be applicable in case of cancelled/ refunded transactions
  • In case of non-payment of installment: if the first EMI is not received the cashback will be withheld, and will only be processed once the repayment has been made from customer account.
  • Axio has the right to amend the terms & conditions, end the offer, or call back any or all its offers without prior notice.
  • Axio reserves the right of final decision on the interpretation of these Terms & Conditions, in case of disputes. For Axio Pay Later related Terms & Conditions, please refer https://axio.co.in/faq/#pay-later
  • Axio reserves the right to employ reasonable technological and other methods to prevent abuse of the Offer terms.
  • Axio is the trade name of CapFloat Financial Services Pvt. Ltd, an NBFC registered with the RBI
  • Axio Pay Later is a product of Axio

settings.offer-text: Flat 10% cashback on transaction up to ₹750
settings.terms:
• Offer is applicable on the first ever transaction on boAt using OlaMoney Postpaid+
  • Offer is valid from: 1st Oct'22 to 31st Dec'22
  • Offer is valid for OlaMoney Postpaid+ active users only.
  • Min txn value: 499
  • Offer is not applicable for postpaid plus users who have not cleared dues beyond their due dates.
  • Offer is exclusive to you and intended for your use only.
  • Cashback will be credited within 10 working days to your active OlaMoney Postpaid+ or Wallet account.
  • Cashback will not be applicable on EMI transaction on OlaMoney Postpaid+

• Get up to Rs.150 Cashback on boAt!
  • No code required.
  • Minimum transaction amount via MobiKwik to avail the offer is Rs.1299/- and above
  • Offer validity period: 1st to 31st October 2022
  • Offer can be availed once during the offer period
  • Offer valid on MobiKwik wallet Payment at boAt online platform
  • Cashback will be credited within 48 hours
  • Both boAt & MobiKwik reserve the right to cancel/change/modify/add/delete any of the terms and conditions of the offer at any time without prior notice
  • If the order is cancelled at boAt's end, boAt (not MobiKwik) will initiate a refund
  • After the refund is initiated, amount will be credited back to wallet within 7-10 days
